This package contains some approximate implementations of the original Pac-Man AIs.
nl.tudelft.jpacman.sprite
 
  • Classes in nl.tudelft.jpacman.board used by nl.tudelft.jpacman
    Class
    Description
    BoardFactory
    A factory that creates Board objects from 2-dimensional arrays of Squares.
  • Classes in nl.tudelft.jpacman.board used by nl.tudelft.jpacman.board
    Class
    Description
    Board
    A top-down view of a matrix of Squares.
    Direction
    An enumeration of possible directions on a two-dimensional square grid.
    Square
    A square on a Board, which can (or cannot, depending on the type) be occupied by units.
    Unit
    A unit that can be placed on a Square.
